item.title: Perfection is an act of cowardice
item.description:
Iâ€™ve been following Van Neistatâ€™s videos since his fifth video was published, which the YouTube algorithm suggested while I was vanning through Walla Walla, Washington. I was killing time hanging out by the river and, having watched most of his brother Caseyâ€™s daily vlogs (rip daily vlogs), quickly watched all his videos beginning to end.

He can get ranty. He can be cranky. He has plenty of opinions I donâ€™t agree with. But his videos about the creative process are fascinating.
